thread.title: ‘Sultan’ first look: Salman Khan as Sultan Ali Khan is intense
thread.title_full: ‘Sultan’ first look: Salman Khan as Sultan Ali Khan is intense - The Times of India

author: Ruchi Kaushal
title: ‘Sultan’ first look: Salman Khan as Sultan Ali Khan is intense
text:
The first look of Salman Khan's much-awaited film Sultan is out.
In a picture having a tagline- 'Wrestling is not a sport, it's about fighting what lies within', Salman looks every bit a wrestler in a beefed up look, intense eyes, cropped hair and moustache.
The actor plays a 40-year-old Haryanvi wrestler, Sultan Ali Khan. Directed by Ali Abbas Zafar, the YRF film is expected to clash with Shah Rukh Khan's Raees on Eid 2016.
Salman Khan himself tweeted the first look of film with the caption, "Here is a picture that was taken while training."
Here is a picture that was taken while training. pic.twitter.com/z9pVIETX6u
— Salman Khan (@BeingSalmanKhan) October 9, 2015 WATCH : Salman Khan finally opens up about the actress in Sultan - TOI
